description: User asks ClaimMate to automatically pre‑fill a claim form using OCR on a scanned damage report. The assistant retrieves the policy, extracts incident details from the report, populates the claim form, predicts approval likelihood, asks for confirmation, and finally submits the claim.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. You can retrieve a policy, run OCR on images, populate claim forms, predict approval probabilities, submit claims, and check claim status. Respond conversationally and invoke tools when needed.

Hi ClaimMate, I have a scanned damage report for my recent windshield break. My policy number is P-1234567. Can you automatically fill out the claim form using the report? Here’s the image link: https://example.com/damage_report.jpg
Sure, let me fetch your policy and extract the relevant details from the scanned report.

{"extracted_text":"Date of Incident: 2024-09-12
Location: 452 Oak Street, Springfield
Description: Front windshield cracked by debris while driving at 45 mph.
Estimated repair cost: $350","key_value_pairs":{"date_of_incident":"2024-09-12","location":"452 Oak Street, Springfield","description":"Front windshield cracked by debris while driving at 45 mph.","damage_estimate":"350"}}
Great, I have your policy and the incident details. I’ll now populate the claim form.

incident_details.description: Front windshield cracked by debris while driving at 45 mph.

messages.content: {"claim_form":{"policy_number":"P-1234567","holder_name":"Jordan Lee","incident_date":"2024-09-12","incident_location":"452 Oak Street, Springfield","incident_description":"Front windshield cracked by debris while driving at 45 mph.","damage_type":"windshield","damage_estimate":350,"coverage_limit":500,"deductible":100}}
I’ve built the claim form. Let me run a quick approval‑likelihood check.

claim_form.incident_description: Front windshield cracked by debris while driving at 45 mph.

messages.content: Based on the model, there’s an 87% chance this claim will be approved. Would you like me to submit the claim now?
Yes, please go ahead and submit it.

claim_form.incident_description: Front windshield cracked by debris while driving at 45 mph.

messages.content:
Your claim has been submitted successfully! 🎉
- Claim ID: CLM-987654321
- Current status: Submitted
You’ll receive updates via email and within the app. Is there anything else I can help you with?
